G

getAllFilms() - Method in class baseAndTesterClasses.FilmDAO
The public getAllFilms method connects to the database using the getConnection method, and then uses an SQL statement to obtain all records from the 'films' database table.
getAllFilms - Class in coreservlets
The public 'getAllFilms' servlet class sets up a HTTP route for getting an ArrayList of all films from the database, and displaying it in a web browser, using doGet and doPost.
getAllFilms() - Constructor for class coreservlets.getAllFilms
 
getAllFilmsTest - Class in baseAndTesterClasses
The 'getAllFilmsTest' public class can be used to test the 'getAllFilms' FilmDAO method, by calling it within a main method.
getAllFilmsTest() - Constructor for class baseAndTesterClasses.getAllFilmsTest
 
getConnection() - Method in class baseAndTesterClasses.FilmDAO
The public getConnection class connects to the JDBC driver, and then to the MySQL films database, which passes through the 'Mudfoot' server.
getDirector() - Method in class baseAndTesterClasses.Film
This film 'getter' gets the film's director.
getFilm(String) - Method in class baseAndTesterClasses.FilmDAO
The public getFilm method connects to the database using the getConnection method, and then uses an SQL statement to search the database for films with titles that match an input string.
getFilm - Class in coreservlets
The public 'getFilm' servlet class sets up a HTTP route for getting an ArrayList of films with a title that matches a given title input string, and displaying it in a web browser, using doGet and doPost.
getFilm() - Constructor for class coreservlets.getFilm
 
getFilmTest - Class in baseAndTesterClasses
The 'getFilmTest' public class can be used to test the 'getFilm' FilmDAO method, by calling it within a main method.
getFilmTest() - Constructor for class baseAndTesterClasses.getFilmTest
 
getID() - Method in class baseAndTesterClasses.Film
This film 'getter' gets the film's id number.
getReview() - Method in class baseAndTesterClasses.Film
This film 'getter' gets the film's review.
getStars() - Method in class baseAndTesterClasses.Film
This film 'getter' gets the film's stars.
getTitle() - Method in class baseAndTesterClasses.Film
This film 'getter' gets the film's title.
getYear() - Method in class baseAndTesterClasses.Film
This film 'getter' gets the film's year.
